meanings.definition: The branch of science that deals with the chemical processes and substances that occur within living organisms.
meanings.sent1: In biochemistry, scientists study how chemicals work in living things.
meanings.sent2: She decided to major in biochemistry to learn more about the chemicals in our bodies.
meanings.sent3: The biochemistry of a banana peel turning brown is quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: The biochemistry of a smile involves a complex interplay of neurotransmitters.
meanings.sent5: Understanding biochemistry helps us comprehend the magic of life itself.

meanings.definition: The study of the chemical compounds and processes that occur in living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Biochemistry involves analyzing the chemical reactions in cells.
meanings.sent2: The professor explained the basics of biochemistry in the first lecture.
meanings.sent3: The biochemistry of a plant growing towards the sunlight is like a dance of molecules.
meanings.sent4: The biochemistry of love is a mysterious blend of hormones and emotions.
meanings.sent5: Studying biochemistry opens a window into the inner workings of life.
